(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP am)
        (ADJP (JJ glad)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB announce)
                (SBAR (IN that)
                  (S
                    (NP (DT the) (NN ieatishootipost) (NN book))
                    (VP (MD will)
                      (VP (VB be)
                        (ADVP (RB officially))
                        (VP (VBN launched)
                          (PP (IN on)
                            (NP (CD 18)))
                          (NP (NNP December) (CD 2010)))))))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VBP are)
        (VP (VBN invited)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB attend)
                (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ very) (JJ first) (NN book) (NN reading) (NN event))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(glad-3, I-1)
cop(glad-3, am-2)
root(ROOT-0, glad-3)
aux(announce-5, to-4)
xcomp(glad-3, announce-5)
mark(launched-13, that-6)
det(book-9, the-7)
nn(book-9, ieatishootipost-8)
nsubjpass(launched-13, book-9)
aux(launched-13, will-10)
auxpass(launched-13, be-11)
advmod(launched-13, officially-12)
ccomp(announce-5, launched-13)
prep(launched-13, on-14)
pobj(on-14, 18-15)
tmod(launched-13, December-16)
num(December-16, 2010-17)
cc(glad-3, and-18)
nsubjpass(invited-21, you-19)
auxpass(invited-21, are-20)
conj(glad-3, invited-21)
aux(attend-23, to-22)
xcomp(invited-21, attend-23)

            (NP (PRP$ our) (NNP Singaporean) (NNP Hawker) (NNP Heritage)))))

    (. .)))

  (S
    (ADVP (RB just))
    (VP (VB like)
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB how))
        (S
          (NP (DT the) (NNPS Japanese))
          (VP
            (VP (VBP tell)
              (NP
                (NP (NNS stories))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (NNP Sushi)
                    (CC and)
                    (NNP Samurai)))))
            (CC and)
            (ADVP (RB even))
            (VP (VBP have)
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (JJ whole) (NN series))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (JJ Japanese) (NN food))))
              (PP (IN on)
                (NP (NNP Manga))))))))
    (. .)))

pobj(at-11, time-14)
advmod(well-16, as-15)
advmod(organized-3, well-16)
cc(organized-3, and-17)
nsubj(practicing-21, I-18)
aux(practicing-21, am-19)
advmod(practicing-21, now-20)
conj(organized-3, practicing-21)
aux(write-23, to-22)
xcomp(practicing-21, write-23)
advmod(write-23, legibly-24)
advmod(autograph-29, so-25)
mark(autograph-29, that-26)
nsubj(autograph-29, I-27)
aux(autograph-29, can-28)
advcl(write-23, autograph-29)
poss(books-31, your-30)
dobj(autograph-29, books-31)


(ROOT
  (S (IN So)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP hope)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (MD can)
            (VP (VB join)
              (NP (PRP us)))))))
    (. .)))


dep(hope-3, So-1)
nsubj(hope-3, I-2)
root(ROOT-0, hope-3)
nsubj(join-6, you-4)
aux(join-6, can-5)
ccomp(hope-3, join-6)
dobj(join-6, us-7)


(ROOT
  (S
    (INTJ (VB Please))
    (VP (VB register)
      (PP (IN on)
        (NP (DT the) (NNP TimeOut) (NNP Magazine) (NNP Fanpage))))
    (. .)))


discourse(register-2, Please-1)
root(ROOT-0, register-2)
prep(register-2, on-3)
det(Fanpage-7, the-4)
nn(Fanpage-7, TimeOut-5)
nn(Fanpage-7, Magazine-6)
pobj(on-3, Fanpage-7)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Look)
      (ADVP (RB forward))
      (PP (TO to)
        (S
          (VP (VBG seeing)
            (NP (PRP you))
            (ADVP (DT all) (RB there))))))
    (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, Look-1)
advmod(Look-1, forward-2)
prep(Look-1, to-3)
pcomp(to-3, seeing-4)
dobj(seeing-4, you-5)
dep(there-7, all-6)
advmod(seeing-4, there-7)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP
      (NP (JJ Many) (NNS thanks))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (NNP Timeout) (NNP Magazine))))
    (, ,)))

      (PP (IN with)
        (NP (NNS Books)))
      (, ,))))

(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NNP Kim) (NNP Joo) (NNP Guan) (NNP Bak) (NNP Kwa)
      (CC and)
      (NNP VCTAsia))
    (PP (IN for)
      (NP (PRP$ their) (JJ generous) (NN sponsorship)))
    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Attached))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN pdf) (NN version))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (DT the) (NN introduction))))
        (CC and)
        (NP
          (NP (CD 1st) (NN chapter))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (DT the) (NN book))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(version-5, Attached-1)
cop(version-5, is-2)
det(version-5, the-3)
nn(version-5, pdf-4)
root(ROOT-0, version-5)
prep(version-5, of-6)
det(introduction-8, the-7)
pobj(of-6, introduction-8)
cc(version-5, and-9)
num(chapter-11, 1st-10)
conj(version-5, chapter-11)
prep(chapter-11, of-12)
det(book-14, the-13)
pobj(of-12, book-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Do))
    (VP (VBP help)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP
            (VP (VB circulate)
              (NP (PRP it)))
            (CC and)
            (VP (VB let)
              (S
                (NP (PRP$ your) (NNS friends))
                (VP (VB know)
                  (PP (IN about)
                    (NP (DT the) (NN book))))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(help-2, Do-1)
root(ROOT-0, help-2)
aux(circulate-4, to-3)
xcomp(help-2, circulate-4)
dobj(circulate-4, it-5)
cc(circulate-4, and-6)
conj(circulate-4, let-7)
poss(friends-9, your-8)
nsubj(know-10, friends-9)
ccomp(let-7, know-10)
prep(know-10, about-11)
det(book-13, the-12)
pobj(about-11, book-13)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (S
      (PP (IN For)
        (NP
          (NP (JJR more) (NNS info)
            (CC and)
            (NNS details))
          (PP (IN on)
            (NP
              (NP (JJ bulk) (NN purchase))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (DT the) (NN book)))))))
      (VP (VBP please)
        (VP (VB write)
          (PP (TO to)))))))


prep(please-12, For-1)
amod(info-3, more-2)
pobj(For-1, info-3)
cc(info-3, and-4)
conj(info-3, details-5)
prep(info-3, on-6)
amod(purchase-8, bulk-7)
pobj(on-6, purchase-8)
prep(purchase-8, of-9)
det(book-11, the-10)
pobj(of-9, book-11)
root(ROOT-0, please-12)
dep(please-12, write-13)
prep(write-13, to-14)
